name: 林含怡
objective: 本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力, 並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。
schedule:
Week 1: Course Introduction
Week 2: The Writing Process
Week 3: Introduction to Paragraph I 
Week 4: No Class
Week 5: Introduction to Paragraph II
Week 6: The Narrative Paragraph I
Week 7: The Narrative Paragraph II
Week 8: Writing Practice & Review
Week 9: Midterm
Week 10: The Descriptive Paragraph I
Week 11: The Descriptive Paragraph II
Week 12: The Expository Paragraph I
Week 13: The Expository Paragraph II
Week 14: Introduction to the Essay I
Week 15: Introduction to the Essay II
Week 16: No Class
Week 17: Writing Practice & Review
Week 18: Final
scorePolicy:
Attendance & participation 15%
Individual reports 20%
Assignments & class activities 25%
Two major papers 40%
materials: Smalley, R. L., Ruetten, M. K. & Kozyrev, J. R. (2012) Refining Composition Skills. Boston: National Geographic Learning.
